note.p: Death: De Walden Court, London (16 December 1916)
Education: Edinburgh University. MB (1866), MD (1868), ScD (Edinb)

Career: Assistant Physician, St Bartholomew's Hospital, London; Lecturer in Materia medica, St Bartholomew's Hospital; on the Chloroform Commission, Hyderabad (1889); Physician, St Bartholomew's Hospital (1897); retired (1904)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1915-1917 vol 89 pp xliv-xlviii, plate, signed by C A
Notes: DSB gives date of death as 16 September 1916; birthplace from 'The Times', 14 March 2001
